title: Seijun Kango Gakuin (Nurse Me!)
synopsis: You wouldn't think that a hospital would be the setting for a series of erotic adventures, but when a new crop of nurses' aides reports for duty, they're confronted by an erotic lesson plan that pushes them to the brink of ecstasy... and sanity.
staff: [['Shinbou, Akiyuki', ['Director']], ['KOTOKO', ['Theme Song Performance', ' Theme Song Lyrics']], ['Sano, Hiroaki', ['Music']]]
